text: Michael John Tilleman (March 30, 1944 – September 18, 2020) was an American professional football player. He was a defensive tackle in the National Football League (NFL) for 11 seasons (1966–76). He played college football for the Montana Grizzlies. He was born in Chinook, Montana. He played for the Minnesota Vikings, New Orleans Saints, Houston Oilers and the Atlanta Falcons. Tilleman died on September 18, 2020 in Havre, Montana from heart disease- related problems, aged 76.Area legend Mike Tilleman passes away at age 76 ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:New Orleans Saints players Category:Tennessee Titans players Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Sportspeople from Montana
title: Mike Tilleman
